item.title: Cracking Marquire's CrackMe_V3_Marquire
item.description: Let’s start off the crackmes series with a basic one: Marquire’s CrackMe_V3_Marquire . Language: C/C++ Platform: Windows Difficulty: 1.3 Quality: 4.3 Arch: x86 Initial run It’s very standard, it just asks for the key and tells us if it’s right or wrong. Initial analysis It’s quite clear what’s going on. Ask for the input, do some simple logic, say if right or wrong and exit.
